oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Centennial celebrations; Dormitories; Public accommodation facilities
Tennessee Centennial and International Exposition (1897 : Nashville, Tenn.); Vanderbilt University
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Pamphlet of the Tennessee Centennial Exposition containing information for accommodations at dormitories at Vanderbilt University in Nashville. The pamphlet has a photograph of the Parthenon on the front and states that accommodations are available from June 20 to September 10. The pamphlet features descriptions of the various dormitories on the campus.
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: Tennessee Centennial and International Exposition Collection, 1895-1900
